A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I wanted to love this movie but was again underwhelmed with this Rey trilogy. Overall\, it was a “good” and much better than TFA; however was not even close to Rogue One IMO. This Disney trilogy has felt patched movie to movie and seems to be lacking a broad vision. On a positive note\, TLJ did a much better job with Rey’s character this time and gave her much more depth - even Kylo seemed a better fit this time. However\, much of the story was borderline boring and the ending just felt lazy and very unsatisfying as a long time Star Wars fan.
